com.kaichunlin.transition

Class DefaultTransitionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kaichunlin.transition.internal.BaseTransitionController
      • com.kaichunlin.transition.internal.DefaultTransitionController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITransitionController, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DefaultTransitionController
extends BaseTransitionController
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    ObjectAnimator is used to provide required transition behavior.

    TODO may be possible to switch to use NineOldDroid's ViewPropertyAnimator for better performance

    Created by Kai-Chun Lin on 2015/4/16.
